hero_section.subtitle: Fullstack developer with experience in enterprise platforms, real-time systems, and scalable web, mobile, and wearable applications.

contact_section.title: Let's work together
contact_section.subtitle: Open to new projects, ideas or collaborations. Feel free to reach out.

about_me_section.p1: I’m Jesús Manuel Pérez Guerra. I started programming at the age of 15, and since then I decided to make programming my professional path. I currently work as a Fullstack Developer, creating web, mobile, and wearable device solutions. I also tutor at my university in subjects such as Structured Programming, OOP, Algorithms and Data Structures, mainly in Java for the last two subjects and in C.
about_me_section.p2: Outside of programming, I enjoy music, video games, and I'm currently learning to play the piano.
about_me_section.p3: My goal as a developer is to continue growing professionally, strengthening my skills and learning new ones when necessary. I enjoy solving problems and challenges through programming.
